# Standard Configuration
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow non-canonical URLs to prevent duplicate content
Disallow: /privacy/
Disallow: /privacy-policy
Disallow: /about/
Disallow: /tools/guides/
Disallow: /services
Disallow: /products

# All main sections are allowed
Allow: /privacy$
Allow: /about$
Allow: /guides/
Allow: /tools/
Allow: /blog/
